item.title: Over M5 bridge blocked drains, 14th December
item.description:
Away from Airport on the downesrd direction coming off the bridge.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bamfurlong Lane, Badgeworth, Tewkesbury

item.title: High Illuminated Bollard Light Out, 13th December
item.description:
On the central traffic island on London Road.nr its junction with Woodgate Close, Charlton Kings PS this is on the far side of the closed bridge on A40 London Road, so assess through central Charlton Kings, not in rush hours or start or ends of school days; or alternatively via Andoversford.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): London Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 3-4 large deep potholes v dangerous, 13th December
item.description:
Just down from Cowley manor on the bridge sections. I previously reported this and they filled them in the last year or so extremely poorly so they have become even worse this time around.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cowley, Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rapidly deteriorating pothole in the road, 13th December
item.description:
There is a pothole that is now through to the base layer of the road construction and is causing issues for vehicles (as it is close to a corner it is both hard to see and avoid). It is opposite the house #44 on Colesbourne Road on the outside of the road going into the bend.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 46, Colesbourne Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
